name: Wheelchair
specifications: Manual or electric; steel or lightweight alloy frame; footrests, armrests, locking wheels; seat width varies (approx. 40-50 cm).
function: Provides safe mobility and transport for patients with impaired movement.
usage: Lock wheels before seating patient; assist as needed; adjust footrests and armrests; unlock and move smoothly, ensuring patient comfort and safety.
maintenance: Use with proper PPE (gloves, mask, eye protection); sterilize reusable components after use and follow manufacturer cleaning protocol; inspect for leaks or damage before each use.
warning: Inadequate mask seal, over-ventilation causing gastric inflation, or improper cleaning leading to infection risk.
